metadata.Title: CVE-2017-6801 on Ubuntu 20.04 FIPS Compliant (focal) - medium.
metadata.Description:
An issue was discovered in ytnef before 1.9.2. There is a potential out-of-bounds access with fields of Size 0 in TNEFParse() in libytnef.

Update Instructions:

Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2017-6801` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
by updating your system to the following package versions:

libytnef0 - 1.9.2-1
ytnef-tools - 1.9.2-1
No subscription required

criterions.comment: libytnef package in focal, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '1.9.2-1').
